name: ProdEdits Estúdio Museum
description:
ProdEdits Estúdio Museum is a Realistic Digital Game Museum about the projects of the company ProdEdits Estúdio.

This game is  free to download and will receive more updates from time to time when the company has new projects to release. In the next updates, the graphics, the projects and the museum itself will get more things to do and even more gameplay to do in the museum.

If you want your photos and projects featured and published in the museum for every one to see, just contact us and give us all the details about what you want to put in the museum for all to see.

For now the Museum is only on Portuguese, in the next updates, there will be more languages in the game.

  • Explore a Realistic House with good graphics.
  • See what the company is doing, projects, games, photos, videos, etc, all inside the museum.
  • Feature and Publish your photographs and projects to put in the museum for everyone to see.

Minimum Specs:  Intel Core i3-3217U CPU 1.80 GHz 2GB Ram Windows 7,8,10

Recommended Specs:  Intel Core i5-3230M  CPU 2.60 GHz 4GB Ram Windows 7,8,10

Note: This game is a Complete version of the Museum, but it will constantly improve graphics, systems, mechanics, projects, etc.

If you like the ProdEdits Estúdio Museum, please donate us or contact us to Feature and Publish your projects or photos in the Museum to continue improving the Museum and really make a Very Realistic Museum for everyone to see.

Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/prodeditsestudio/

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5-V_xpETL3GbP2f7JCR-Iw

Game developed by:
